scripts.install: cd web-client && npm install && cd ../web-server && npm install && cd ..
scripts.migration:run: docker exec backend sh -c 'npx ts-node /app/node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:run --dataSource /app/src/orm/data-source.ts'
scripts.migration:revert: docker exec backend sh -c 'npx ts-node /app/node_modules/typeorm/cli.js migration:revert --dataSource /app/src/orm/data-source.ts'
